channel.title: CVE Feed for tmux -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tmux -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-27347|2024-09-17T00:20:28.710Z -- tmux -- tmux
item.description: In tmux before version 3.1c the function input_csi_dispatch_sgr_colon() in file input.c contained a stack-based buffer-overflow that can be exploited by terminal output.
